answerText: pointers[10] Pointers fall in this category of data types, which also includes characters and integers. This data type is defined as the basic or built-in datatypes of a programming language.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Illinois A + Dorman A + Wellesley | 9 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question: In C, these variables are declared with an asterisk. For 10 points each: [10] Identify these variables whose content is a memory address. When NULL, they can cause segmentation faults.
